name: SongOfTheWind
description:
Song of the Wind is a short third person adventure platformer where you play as Tenzin, a traveller on a quest to reach a very special place. Navigate a world made up of floating islands by running, jumping, and gliding your way through the beautiful landscape with your trusty glider. Up here, the wind will be your strongest ally. 

Features: 

A beautifully hand-crafted world inspired by Tibet 

Relaxing gameplay 

Fluid character movement 

A dynamic music system that adapts to your movements

Very adorable yaks
